alert.note: Alert for East Otter Tail; Grant; Wadena; West Otter Tail; Wilkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 1:08AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Clay, Otter Tail, Grant, Wilkin and southeastern Becker Counties through 215 AM CDT... At 108 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Comstock to White Rock. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fergus Falls, Wadena, Breckenridge, Perham, Barnesville, Pelican Rapids and Ottertail Lake. This includes Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 20 and 80. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Otter Tail; Grant; Wadena; West Otter Tail; Wilkin
